page.title: 05CITY-CENTRE DEVELOPMENTS 3
page.content: Many of the former shops have been converted to banks and building society offices and there are a large number of employment agencies now located in Union Street. A further development has been the increase in restaurants and in the past year seven new wine bars have opened in the vicinity of Union Street.The number of bars and nightclubs has also risen and many of the bars have extended licensing hours remaining open now until 2am in the morning.Some of these changes reflect national trends while others are attributed to the wealth generated from oil amonngst some of the population.Another sign of this wealth is the absence of waste land or derilict property though too many speculative offices have been built.
